mz.Heap

  • Uses of Heap in mz

    Subclasses of Heap in mz
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    class 
    SmoothHeap
    Smooth Heap Sort it is another version of heapsort that is designed to minimize the number of comparisons performed during the sort.
    class 
    TernaryHeap
    Ternary Heap Sort which uses a ternary heap instead of a binary heap; that is, each element in the heap has three children.
    class 
    WeakHeap
    Weak Heap Sort construction uses a buffer that supports constant-time insertion.

    Intro Sort is a hybrid sorting algorithm that combines the strengths of Quick Sort and Insertion Sort.

  • Uses of Heap in mz.intro.introDPQ

    Subclasses of Heap in mz.intro.introDPQ
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    class 
    IntroDPQHeap
    IntroDPQ (Dual Pivot Quick) Heap Sort is a hybrid sorting algorithm that combines the strengths of Dual Pivot Quick Sort and Heap Sort.
    class 
    IntroDPQSmoothHeap
    IntroDPQ (Dual Pivot Quick) Smooth Heap Sort is a hybrid sorting algorithm that combines the strengths of Dual Pivot Quick Sort and Smooth Heap Sort.
    class 
    IntroDPQTernaryHeap
    IntroDPQ (Dual Pivot Quick) Ternary Heap Sort is a hybrid sorting algorithm that combines the strengths of Dual Pivot Quick Sort and Ternary Heap Sort.
    class 
    IntroDPQWeakHeap
    IntroDPQ (Dual Pivot Quick) Weak Heap Sort is a hybrid sorting algorithm that combines the strengths of Dual Pivot Quick Sort and Weak Heap Sort.
